DOC.brief_summary: Investigators compare tidal volume single rescuer ventilation use modify bag valve mask integrate internal handle versus conventional bag valve mask manikin model .
DOC.brief_title: Ventilation Using Bag Valve Mask With Integrated Internal Handle
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , crossover study assess tidal volume deliver use standard modify bag valve mask ( BVM ) device manikin airway model . Data collect July 2015 October 2015 San Antonio Military Medical Center . Emergency medicine provider ( physician , physician assistant , resident , nurse , medic ) randomize device order . Prior participation participant fill survey indicate job status , gender , year medical experience , experience level BVM ventilation . Hand grip strength size ( length , width , span ) measure . Each participant ask provide BVM ventilation use assigned device rate 10 breath per minute 3 minute total 30 breath . Tidal volume deliver breath record milliliter . After 3 minute rest period , test repeat second device . After ventilation device , participant complete anonymous questionnaire use Likert scale ass perceive quality modify device include ease use , ability provide superior mask seal , willingness use emergency situation , overall preference two device . Each participant serve his/her control .
DOC.criteria: Emergency Department healthy volunteer ( physician assistant , resident , paramedic , nurse , medic , respiratory therapist . Not trained basic life support
